summary: Creates a PredictiveAlpineBytesActor class that inherits from BytesActor and PredictiveAlpineActor, then runs the actor forever if this script is the main one.

details.comment: Creates a PredictiveAlpineBytesActor class that inherits from BytesActor and PredictiveAlpineActor, then runs the actor forever if this script is the main one.
